text: Voistynu, ti, yaki uviruvaly, pereselylysya y borolysya na shlyakhu Allaha, zhertvuyuchy svoyim maynom i dushamy, i ti, yaki daly prytulok inshym i dopomahaly yim — pryyateli odne odnomu! A ti, yaki uviruvaly y ne pereselylysya, ne mozhutʹ buty vashymy pryyatelyamy, poky ne pereselyatʹsya! Yakshcho vony prosytymutʹ u vas dopomohy v spravakh relihiyi, to dopomozhitʹ yim, ale ne proty lyudey, iz yakymy vy mayete dohovir. Voistynu, Allah bachytʹ te, shcho vy robyte
